metadata.dc:author: Gutiérrez Baños, J L
Portillo Martin, J A
Martin Garcia, B
Hernandez Rodriguez, R
metadata.dc:description: Diagnosing renal adenocarcinoma in pregnancy is rare. When it presents during pregnancy, its symptomatology is similar to that observed under other circumstances of life. Because pregnancy is comprised of different periods, deciding when nephrectomy should be performed may vary, although it should be attempted as early as possible.
metadata.dc:title: Adenocarcinoma renal en la gestación. Aportación de un caso.
[Adenocarcinoma of the kidney in pregnancy. Presentation of a case].
